description:
*2005-2015 凉月雅思十周年 专注雅思考试*

2015年4月18日雅思考试预测专用贴

● 声明：

以下关于雅思考试的预测资料已授权沪江留学发布，其他网站如需转载需经过沪江留学授权(获得免费授权)，并不得对文字、图片作任何修改。

●雅思机经预测适用时间：

2015年月18日

4月25日与30日考试的考生可先行参考本预测准备，相邻考试预测范围差别不大

每场考试都有预测，会在其前一场考试结束后的1-2日内发布

●雅思机经预测适用考区：

中国大陆地区，港澳台地区，亚洲其他地区（日韩泰）以及澳洲均可参考本预测。以上地区笔试部分（听力、阅读、写作）为统一试卷，口语考试各地区题目可能不同，请参照预测范围进行准备。欧洲、美洲以及其他亚太以外地区不适宜使用该预测，目前除亚太地区以外由于资源和信息等问题还无法提供详细预测，考生朋友可自行参考机经复习。

●机经预测适用类别：

学术类（A类）

培训类（G类）

机经列表下载：无忧雅思听力机经2014夏季版>>

● 预测使用说明：

参考过去考过的题目对参加考试是有帮助的，这也是剑桥出剑桥雅思全真试题（Past Papers）的原因，通过以前的考试获取考试的重点，是一种聪明的学习方法。预测可以告诉你哪些考点还可能被考到，这样就可以在复习过程中有重点的学习。

听力版本对应无忧雅思听力机经，机经可到沪江网和无忧雅思网免费下载。

最新考试回顾 REVIEW

■ 听力

↘Section 1 = 母亲电话咨询两个女儿上画画培训课程 V30076 section1 一级预测命中
↘Section 2 = 几个酒店的各项服务情况调查对比V130829 section2
↘Section 3 = 关于料理书的讨论 V130713 section3
↘Section 4 = 待确认

■ 阅读

↘Passage 1—工作与家庭平衡
↘Passage 2—蜜蜂研究与仿生
↘Passage 3—mind mapping

■ 写作

A类
Task1: Bar+Line
The graph and chart give information and forecast about the vehicle and CO2 emission in England and between 2000 and 2020.
Task2: 社会类-就业
Older people who need employment have to compete with younger people. What problems will be caused? And what are the solutions?
该题目的重点在原因与解决方案，预测中有就业和老龄化的题目，其中观点可借鉴。 

■ 口语

各地区题目不同，具体请关注各地区口语回忆。

这里，有精选练习课堂和学习资料，这里，有优秀的老师提供作业讲解，这里，有志同道合的好战友，共同进步，横扫各大出国考试！

title: 2015年4月18日雅思预测【凉月版】

description:
4月12日托福考试综合写作真题回忆

文章的主题是在三藩市和洛杉矶之间修建告诉铁路系统好还是不好。

阅读文章说了三个好处：

1. 这会减少交通维护费用。

因为西部公路维修费用昂贵，建立轨道交通后会减少破坏。

2. 这会缓解交通拥堵。

建设完毕之后人们会选择轨道交通出行。

3. 这个系统的建成有利于环境保护。

它将会是交通出行工具里最环保的方式之一。

听力讲座进行反驳：

1. 新建高铁系统费用更高。

政府需要借1亿的费用去修建，相当于政府年收入的75%，而且偿还很艰难。

2. 人们选择什么交通方式取决于其方便程度。

东海岸公交系统发达去车站很方便，但西海岸公交不方便，火车站都在市区，人们去车站不方便，人们其实也不会选择轨道交通依然会开车。

3. 高速铁路无法覆盖所有地区。

有的地区无法实现高速，所以这些区域的速度跟普通速度的火车一样，并不能节能，提高燃料利用率。

4月12日托福考试综合写作范文

Both the lecture and the reading passage discussed a policy concerning the establishment of a high-speed rail-line system between San Francisco and Los Angeles. However, the lecturer claims that it may not bring about benefits for the Americans based on the following three assumptions.

First, the professor states that it will be costly to build up a new transportation system which takes up about 100 billion dollars, but the reading passage points out that the construction will undoubtedly lower the cost for maintenance of public transportation somehow.

Second, the lecturer contends that the general public are free to choose their own ways of commutation, plus, it is far more convenient for commuters to reach the railway station under the east coastline traffic system than the one of the west area. People are prone to drive their own cars to the railway station instead. On the contrary, the author states that this newly-built high speed railway system will alleviate the traffic congestion to a large extent since more and more individuals will pick this high speed rail line as a great option.

Third, the professor also indicates that for some poorly-reached areas, this high speed rail line system may not be available and give rise to a boost in efficiency and punctuality of public transportation. Moreover, even if the high speed trains manage to save time by means of speed, they will surely lower their speed to adapt to the inferior conditions of certain areas. Conversely, the reading passage holds the view that the high speed railway system will contribute its own to environmental protection and this approach of commutation will evidently become one of the most favorables among the general public.

In conclusion, the lecturer demonstrated his disapproval of this high speed rail line system from three aspects: the significant costs, the subtle influence on traffic system, and its possible inability to cover some areas along the routine. All three perspectives are totally contradictive with what has been told in the reading passage. 

4月12日托福考试独立写作范文>>

title: 4月12日托福写作真题解析及范文

description:
4月12日托福考试口语真题 TASK 1

Talk about how cellphone has changed people's lives. Explain your answer in details.

这道题其实跟11年3月13日考的Which technology has made the greatest impact on people’s life in your country: airplane, computer or television?有异曲同工之妙，细心的同学们如果按照Jasper老师在公开课里所教授的那样——给机经做减法的话就命中考题了哟！详细题目在4月12日沪江托福写作大小范围预测机经里可查看。

详细范文如下：

I believe cellphone has greatly changed people's lives in our country for the following reasons.

For one thing, computer can be used as a convenient tool to write research papers and create PowerPoint presentations.

For another, computer can also be used as an efficient tool to communicate with others. People now have been accustomed to chat through online communication tools such as QQ, CCTalk and so forth.

Further more, computer can meet all our needs of entertainment, including music, movies and video games.

4月12日托福考试口语真题 TASK 2

范文：

When traveling, do you prefer to stay at one place for a long time or spend less time but vistit more places? Explain your answer in details.

I prefer to spend more time at one place for the following reasons. First, it's not enjoyable at all having to go from one place to the next constantly. Last year I joined a tourist group, we visited lots of places in a few days. It was exhausting and stressful.

On the other hand, staying in place for days is nice and relaxing. I will have more time to explore my surroundings, get to know local people. Next time I travel, I will book two weeks in a hotel and rent myself a small car, so I can really get to know a city step by step.

细心的同学也会发现这道题其实跟我们在托福口语机经大讲堂上经常练习的这道题：

Do you like to travel to somewhere you have never been or the place you have ever been?

Why? Use specific reasons and examples to support your answer.  

4月12日托福考试写作真题回忆及范文>>
